mapper.insert: insert into category (name, type, sort, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{name}, #{type}, #{sort}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.update:
update category
name = #{name},
type = #{type},
sort = #{sort},
status = #{status},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select id, name, type, sort, status, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, create_user as createUser, update_user as updateUser from category
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and type = #{type}
order by sort asc,create_time desc
